channel.title: lunarlily updates
channel.description: Update feed for the fourth coolest website on the moon

item.title: New TOTW and new neighbors!
item.description: Finally breaking the Thursday update stretch. New TOTW, the exciting (and very belated!) first addition to the Neighbors section, and a little notice about ongoing site construction (which is why I've been rather quiet!)

item.title: Journal update! Talking about some books
item.description: New entry in the journal and a new TOTW. Whenever I update the site, it somehow always ends up on a Thursday...

item.title: New TOTW
item.description: New TOTW! Working on several bigger things behind the scenes, life got busy for a bit so I have nothing to show yet but they're coming

item.title: New Thing of the Week
item.description: New TOTW, reorganized the archive to be in reverse chronological order (newest to oldest), a few housekeeping things too.

item.title: An RSS feed is born!
item.description: If I set everything up correctly, there should now be a link on the right sidebar to this RSS feed! Hello! I also updated a few things on the credits page, including links to helpful RSS guides and some new VSCode extensions I started using recently.
